text: Las Vegas is an American television series broadcast by NBC from September 22, 2003 to February 15, 2008. == Cast == * James Caan as Edward Melvin Deline * Josh Duhamel as Danny McCoy * James Lesure as Mike Cannon * Vanessa Marcil as Samantha Jane "Sam" Marquez * Molly Sims as Delinda Deline * Nikki Cox as Mary Connell * Marsha Thomason as Nessa Holt * Tom Selleck as A.J. title: Las Vegas (TV series)
